metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12951 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Mongoose before 6.15. The parse_mqtt() function in mg_mqtt.c has a critical heap-based buffer overflow.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Yakun Zhang and Zheng Huang of Baidu Security Labs

notes.Note: alexmurray> smplayer in >= bionic contains an embedded copy of mongoose ebarretto> smplayer embeds a copy, which is unused in any released version and disabled since 18.5.0~ds1-1

criterions.comment: smplayer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
